languages.text: "Вот как? Род Вьятт — один из самых древних в протекторате фон Валанциус — вероятно, раз наследница столь уважаемой крови не сумела справиться с тем, что выпало на ее долю, то ситуация должна была быть экстраординарной..."

traits.locale_text: "Вот как? Род Вьятт — один из самых древних в торговой империи фон Валанциус — вероятно, раз наследница столь уважаемой крови не сумела справиться с тем, что выпало на ее долю, то ситуация должна была быть экстраординарной..."

languages.text: "Truly? The Vyatt line is one of the oldest in the von Valancius protectorate — if the inheritor of such well-respected blood could not handle whatever had befallen her, then the situation must have been extraordinary indeed..."
languages.original_text: "Вот как? Род Вьятт — один из самых древних в протекторате фон Валанциус — вероятно, раз наследница столь уважаемой крови не сумела справиться с тем, что выпало на ее долю, то ситуация должна была быть экстраординарной..."

traits.locale_text: "Truly? The Vyatt line is one of the oldest in the von Valancius trade empire — if the inheritor of such well-respected blood could not handle whatever had befallen her, then the situation must have been extraordinary indeed..."

"Truly? The Vyatt line is one of the oldest in the von Valancius trade empire — if the inheritor of such well-respected blood could not handle whatever had befallen her, then the situation must have been extraordinary indeed..."

"Truly? The Vyatt line is one of the oldest in the von Valancius trade empire — if the inheritor of such well-respected blood could not handle whatever had befallen her, then the situation must have been extraordinary indeed..."

"Truly? The Vyatt line is one of the oldest in the von Valancius trade empire — if the inheritor of such well-respected blood could not handle whatever had befallen her, then the situation must have been extraordinary indeed..."

"Truly? The Vyatt line is one of the oldest in the von Valancius protectorate — if the inheritor of such well-respected blood could not handle whatever had befallen her, then the situation must have been extraordinary indeed..."

languages.text: “真的吗？维亚特家族可是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝中最古老的家族之一。如果就连如此受人尊敬的家族继承人，都无法解决她遇到的麻烦，那情况一定非常特殊……”
languages.original_text: "Truly? The Vyatt line is one of the oldest in the von Valancius protectorate — if the inheritor of such well-respected blood could not handle whatever had befallen her, then the situation must have been extraordinary indeed..."

traits.locale_text: “真的吗？维亚特家族可是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝中最古老的家族之一。如果就连如此受人尊敬的家族继承人，都无法解决她遇到的麻烦，那情况一定非常特殊……”

languages.text: «¿De verdad? El linaje de los Vyatt es uno de los más antiguos del protectorado von Valancius. Si la heredera de una casa tan respetada no pudo resolver el problema que le aquejaba, la situación debía de ser excepcional...».
languages.original_text: "Truly? The Vyatt line is one of the oldest in the von Valancius protectorate — if the inheritor of such well-respected blood could not handle whatever had befallen her, then the situation must have been extraordinary indeed..."

traits.locale_text: «¿De verdad? El linaje de los Vyatt es uno de los más antiguos del protectorado von Valancius. Si la heredera de una casa tan respetada no pudo resolver el problema que le aquejaba, la situación debía de ser excepcional...».

languages.text: 「それはまことですか？ビャット家はフォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の中でもっとも古い家系のひとつです。そのような立派な血筋を受け継ぐ者が、自分の身に降りかかった事態に対処できないとはよほどの事だったのでしょう…」
languages.original_text: "Truly? The Vyatt line is one of the oldest in the von Valancius protectorate — if the inheritor of such well-respected blood could not handle whatever had befallen her, then the situation must have been extraordinary indeed..."

traits.locale_text: 「それはまことですか？ビャット家はフォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の中でもっとも古い家系のひとつです。そのような立派な血筋を受け継ぐ者が、自分の身に降りかかった事態に対処できないとはよほどの事だったのでしょう…」

languages.text: "Wirklich? Die Vyatt-Linie ist eine der ältesten im Protektorat von Valancius – wenn die Erbin solch angesehenen Bluts nicht mit ihren Sorgen fertig wird, muss die Lage in der Tat außergewöhnlich gewesen sein ..."
languages.original_text: "Truly? The Vyatt line is one of the oldest in the von Valancius protectorate — if the inheritor of such well-respected blood could not handle whatever had befallen her, then the situation must have been extraordinary indeed..."

traits.locale_text: "Wirklich? Die Vyatt-Linie ist eine der ältesten im Protektorat von Valancius – wenn die Erbin solch angesehenen Bluts nicht mit ihren Sorgen fertig wird, muss die Lage in der Tat außergewöhnlich gewesen sein ..."

languages.text: « Vraiment ? La maison des Vyatt est l'une des plus anciennes du protectorat von Valancius. Si l'héritière d'une lignée aussi prestigieuse s'est laissé dépasser par les événements, la situation devait être d'une gravité sans précédent... »
languages.original_text: "Truly? The Vyatt line is one of the oldest in the von Valancius protectorate — if the inheritor of such well-respected blood could not handle whatever had befallen her, then the situation must have been extraordinary indeed..."

traits.locale_text: « Vraiment ? La maison des Vyatt est l'une des plus anciennes du protectorat von Valancius. Si l'héritière d'une lignée aussi prestigieuse s'est laissé dépasser par les événements, la situation devait être d'une gravité sans précédent... »

languages.text: "Gerçekten mi? Vyatt ailesi, von Valancius protektorasındaki en eski soylardan biridir. Böyle saygın bir ailenin vârisi karşılaştığı sorunlarla baş edememişse durum gerçekten de olağan dışı ölçekte olmalı."
languages.original_text: "Truly? The Vyatt line is one of the oldest in the von Valancius protectorate — if the inheritor of such well-respected blood could not handle whatever had befallen her, then the situation must have been extraordinary indeed..."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçekten mi? Vyatt ailesi von Valancius protektorasındaki en eski soylardan biridir. Böyle saygın bir ailenin vârisi, karşılaştığı sorunlarla baş edememişse durum gerçekten de olağan dışı ölçekte olmalı."
